personal.name: Diran Dodda
personal.title: AI Engineer | Multi-Agent Architect | LLM Systems
personal.description: I design and ship intelligent systems that blend multi-agent LLMs, retrieval pipelines, and scalable MLOps. From autonomous financial analysts to BERT-grade sentiment engines, I turn complex data into decisive products.

currentFocus.title: Agentic LLM Systems
currentFocus.description: Designing autonomous agents that plan, retrieve, and act - powered by retrieval-augmented generation, vector search, and structured decision policies.

summary.title: Operationalized intelligence
summary.description: Shipped multi-agent and RAG pipelines that automate financial analysis, reduce manual review by 70%, and deliver context-aware insights at production scale.

summary.title: Low-latency systems
summary.description: Built BERT-driven sentiment inference serving 15K tweets per minute with sub-100ms latency, plus monitoring for drift and automated retraining.

summary.title: Cloud-native MLOps
summary.description: Containerized deployments on AWS with CI/CD, GPU cost optimizations, and robust APIs—keeping models fresh and reliable in the wild.

skills.technologies: LangChain, LlamaIndex, OpenAI API, Hugging Face Transformers, Claude API.
PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras, fine-tuning LLMs, transfer learning, neural architecture design.
BERT, LSTM, GPT, T5, Sentence Transformers, prompt engineering, RAG systems.
FAISS, Pinecone, Chroma, semantic search, embedding pipelines, document retrieval.
AWS (SageMaker, Lambda, EC2), Docker, CI/CD, model serving, FastAPI/Flask APIs.
Python, SQL, PySpark, Kafka, Airflow, ETL at scale, interactive AI interfaces (Streamlit, Gradio, React).

projects.title: Agentic AI Financial Analyst
projects.description: Autonomous multi-agent system processing 200GB+ of market data with FAISS-indexed SEC filings and ensemble forecasting.
highlights: ReAct-style orchestration across 4 specialized agents with LangChain tool-use framework.
Prophet + XGBoost ensemble achieving R^2 0.88 for price signal predictions.
Streamlit interface for natural-language queries cutting analysis time by 70%.
Walk-forward validation with automated metrics tracking (MAE, RMSE, MAPE).

projects.title: Real-Time Twitter Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: Production BERT inference stack serving 15K tweets/min with sub-100ms latency for brand monitoring.
highlights: Streaming NLP architecture (Kafka + PySpark + BERT) with intelligent caching for burst traffic.
LSTM and BERT ensemble classifying tweets into Positive/Negative/Neutral sentiment.
Live Streamlit dashboard enabling faster response to sentiment swings.
Fine-tuned domain models boosting accuracy by 12% over baseline transformers.

projects.title: Agentic Stock Price Predictor
projects.description: ML-driven stock prediction with walk-forward backtesting and automated trading signals.
highlights: Technical feature engineering with RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands, and rolling statistics.
Walk-forward validation with transaction cost modeling (2 bps per trade).
Automated equity curve and drawdown analysis with metrics (CAGR, Sharpe, max drawdown).
Agent-based architecture following Observe-Think-Act-Reflect pattern for autonomous trading.

projects.title: Conversational AI Support Bot
projects.description: GPT-powered chatbot with RAG system resolving 85% of 1K+ daily support tickets across 5K+ docs.
highlights: Production prompts with conversation memory and safety guardrails.
Vector search over company knowledge base using Pinecone embeddings.
Feedback loop capturing failed queries for iterative tuning and improvement.
Seamless context handoff to human agents with conversation state preservation.

projects.title: Fake News Detection AI
projects.description: Published NLP classifier achieving 92% accuracy on 20K+ news articles with explainability.
highlights: Compared BERT transformers vs. traditional ML pipelines (SVM, Random Forest, Naive Bayes).
Attention weight visualizations showing model reasoning for interpretability.
Linguistic and credibility feature engineering improving robustness to adversarial examples.
Published in International Journal of Advanced Computer Science (2024).

projects.title: Hospital Resource Optimization Agent
projects.description: Multi-agent RL system with LSTM forecasting reducing ICU wait times and emergency latency.
highlights: Integrated Prophet/LSTM admission forecasts with RL policies for dynamic bed allocation.
Multi-objective optimization balancing wait times, utilization, and patient outcomes.
Simulation environment for policy validation before production rollout.
FastAPI deployment handling 1000+ req/sec with real-time decisions.

projects.title: Hybrid Music Recommender System
projects.description: IEEE-published neural recommender achieving MAP@10: 0.85 via collaborative + content fusion.
highlights: Two-tower architecture learning user/item embeddings over 1M+ interactions.
Cold-start solved via content features (audio, metadata, lyrics).
A/B tests demonstrated double-digit relevance lift and engagement.
Published at IEEE Conference on Recommender Systems (2023).

projects.title: Data Science Practice Portfolio
projects.description: Comprehensive notebooks covering deep learning, NLP, CV, and data analysis workflows.
highlights: End-to-end ML pipelines from data preprocessing to deployment.
Advanced visualization with Matplotlib, Seaborn, and Plotly.
Statistical analysis, hypothesis testing, and experiment tracking.
Reproducible research patterns for faster iteration.

projects.title: NLP Entity Recognition System
projects.description: spaCy-based NER pipeline with custom training and production API serving.
highlights: Custom entity models trained on domain-specific datasets.
Efficient text processing pipelines handling millions of documents.
Integration with knowledge graphs for entity linking and disambiguation.
RESTful API for real-time entity extraction in production.

projects.title: Agentic RAG with CrewAI
projects.description: Personal project exploring CrewAI multi-agent RAG patterns with orchestrated roles.
highlights: Crew of manager/worker agents for retrieval, reasoning, and synthesis.
Config-driven pipeline to swap tools and data sources quickly.
Lightweight evaluation hooks for prompt and retrieval quality.

projects.title: Multi-Agentic RAG
projects.description: Interactive RAG application built for parallel agent workflows and continuous learning.
highlights: Parallel retriever/synthesizer agents with shared memory.
Topic-aware chunking to keep context relevant and concise.
CLI + notebook utilities for quick experimentation.

projects.title: Profile & Branding (niftydiran-ui)
projects.description: Public GitHub profile README highlighting AI focus and project links.
highlights: Elevator pitch and skills snapshot for recruiters and collaborators.
Links out to flagship AI/ML projects and notebooks.
Lightweight, fast-loading profile landing page.

achievements: Built AWS data pipelines processing 10M+ records daily with ML-powered classification and quality validation.
Created NLP analytics dashboard automating insights from unstructured docs, cutting manual review by 40%.
Production anomaly detection boosted issue discovery by 30% over rule-based baselines.
Designed CI/CD for model rollout with Docker + CodePipeline enabling weekly AI updates.
Optimized GPU workloads via spot strategies and batching, trimming compute spend by 15%.
Mentored engineers on deep learning, prompt design, and AI architecture.
experience.technologies: Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Transformers, AWS (EC2, Lambda, SageMaker, S3), Docker.
